resources.string: Simon will flash a sequence of lights. When Simon has finished, the player will have to press each light in the correct, sequential order
Like in standard Simon, Simon will flash a sequence of lights. When Simon has finished, the player will have to press each light in the correct, reverse sequential order.

Simon will flash a sequence of lights. When Simon has finished, the player will have to press a light and each light in the correct, sequential order. However, there will be no colors to the buttons, or unique audio tones.

* "Bleep" sound effect recorded by Mike Koenig 
http://soundbible.com/1252-Bleep.html 
 
 * "Computer Error Alert" sound created by Mike Koenig 
http://soundbible.com/1540-Computer-Error-Alert.html 
 
 * Button flashes created by Christopher Greenup
